column2: an A.M. Eatery////Visited this location twice while on vacation! The wait could be up to an hour at times
column3: but very worth it. If your party is small enough
column4: opt for seats at the bar which is first come
column5: first served. The menu has a wide variety
column7: you can't go wrong! The ambiance is relaxed yet professional. Our favorite options were the "Sandwich I Am" with pretzel bun and the "Benny Goodman" lox and cream cheese eggs Benedict. Parking very limited.
